lines: Transcripted notes of Anna Creesy - Aboard the Confident - Mapping of unnamed sea
Day 67 :
Got out of that neverending storm - Arrived on island of fishermen - Locals don’t know much
Day 70 :
Unpredictable navigating conditions - Backtrack when ship caught in streams - Need to be careful - Locals mentioned island north-north-east
Day 89 :
Travel was long - Managed to get out of this maze - Locals talk in riddles - Don’t seem to understand what I want to achieve - On my own now - Not far from my goal
Day ??? :
Lost count of days - Don’t know where I am - Can’t backtrack
- notes end here
